EmailTemplate.name: 2020BK-10 Dealer Match Incentive Program EXTERNAL.2020BK-10 Dealer Match Incenti
EmailTemplate.subject: 2020 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | October 2020
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here are is week's sales bulletin:
xCruze Autopilot Upgrade
BendixKing is excited to announce upgrade / replacement pricing and ordering guidance for existing owners of legacy TruTrak products. This upgrade pricing is available regardless of whether the legacy TruTrak product is still in production by BendixKing or not. Here is Dealer Bulletin 2020BK-10 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020BK - 10 %E2%80%93 xCruze Upgrade.pdf]]>.
The complete list of 2020 sales bulletins is available at aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
